ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the alliance base has shields. ... Zardus eyes narrow at Dark One s messge. Ominous? He says into his comm-link, Very well, leave him outside. Zardus

Yes, the alliance base has shields.

::Zardus/DeathStorm::

Zardus' eyes narrow at Dark One's messge. "Ominous?" He says into his 
comm-link, "Very well, leave him outside." Zardus says and lowers the shields 
for several seconds so that the Oblitercons could come in.

He leans back in his chair. So, Ominous comes crawling back.... He frowns, 
thinking of the last time Ominous was part of the alliance. He'd have to 
watch him carefully....

He turns to Nemesis as the bot enters the room. "Can you and DeathStorm go 
investigate these three new predacons that landed?" He asks, pointing at the 
scanners which showed Dirge, Ramjet, and Skywarp. "See if you can recruit 
them."

"DeathStorm, I'm sending you on a mission with Nemesis. He will explain it to 
you." He says into his comm-link. He looks at Nemesis. "Try not to kill them 
unless absolutely nessesary. We are allied with the predacons, and they could 
come in handy."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm lands near the alliance base, going inside.

"I'm on my way." He says and heads off toward the bridge. He enters and walks 
up to Nemesis. "Where are we going?"
